150: Huh? You're awake! Hey come! She's awake!
唔！你醒了么！姐姐大人！她醒过来了！
あ！目が覚めた！お姉ちゃん、気がついたよ！
아! 눈을 떴어! 언니, 정신 차렸어!
Ah, you're awake! Sis, she's awake!
Well! You're awake! Sister-sama! She's awake!
Ah! I'm awake! Sis, I'm awake!
Are you alright? Do you know who I am? Does it hurt?
怎么样？知道我是谁么？身体有什么问题么？还有哪里疼么？
どうです？私が誰だか分かりますか？身体は問題ないですか？まだどこか痛みますか？
어때요? 내가 누군지 알아보겠어요? 몸은 괜찮아요? 아직 어디 아픈 데 있어요?
How are you feeling? Do you know who I am? Does it hurt anywhere?
How's that? Do you know who I am? Is there anything wrong with your body? Does it hurt anywhere else?
What do you think? Do you know who I am? Is everything alright with your body? Do you still feel any pain?
等下！等下！姐姐大人太心急啦！
待って待って、お姉ちゃん、焦りすぎ！
Wait! Wait! You're too eager, sister!
Wait, wait, sis, you're in too much of a hurry!
总感觉是似曾相识的情景。
この光景いつかどこかで見たような気がする。
이 광경 언젠가 어디선가 본 것 같은 느낌이 들어.
またブローニャに心配かけちゃった。

う……すみません、あれはあなたを鍛えるためにやむを得ず……でも、今のあなたはもう十分頼りになります。今回の作戦はあなたのおかげで順調にいきました。最後は危なかったですが、無事で良かったです。

Well ... sorry, that is in order to train you had to ... but now you have become very reliable, this battle thanks to you to end smoothly, although the last encounter in the crisis, but fortunately there is no danger.
U...... sorry, that was unavoidable to train you......, but you are already dependable enough now. This operation went well thanks to you. It was close at the end, but I am glad you are safe.

Looks like you're alright. You were out cold for an entire day.

msg
Under Herrscher's attack, ME is heavily damaged. We almost lost the arsenal too. Luckily we've salvaged one production line. So we got some result in this operation.
ME社在律者的攻击下受到的重创，兵工厂也损失严重，不过幸好我们抢救回了一条制造流水线，所以这次的作战也不是一无所获。
ME社は、律者の攻撃で激しく損壊しました。兵器工場の損傷も深刻です。ただ、幸いなことに製造ラインの1本は復旧できました。ですから、今回の作戦は無駄なものではありません。この収穫は大きなものです。
ME사는 율자의 공격으로 심하게 손상되었습니다. 병기 공장의 손상도 심각합니다. 다만, 다행히 제조 라인의 1개는 복구할 수 있었습니다. 따라서 이번 작전은 헛된 것이 아닙니다. 이 수확은 큰 것입니다.

ME Corporation was serverely damaged by the Herrscher's attack. The weapons manufacturing plant was also severely damaged. Luckily we've managed to salvage one of the production lines, so it wasn't all in vain.
The ME Society was badly hit by the Ruler's attack, and the arsenal was badly damaged, but fortunately we salvaged a manufacturing line, so the battle wasn't for nothing.

The ME company was severely damaged by the Ruler's attack. The weapons factory was also severely damaged. Fortunately, however, one of the production lines has been restored. Therefore, this operation was not in vain. This harvest is a big one.
msg
I don't know why the Herrscher did not finish us off, the situation is still not optimistic...
虽然不知道为什么律者没有对我们进行致命一击，但是我们现在的情况依然不乐观……
どうして、律者が私たちにトドメを刺さなかったのかは分かりません。ただ、依然として楽観視できる状況ではありませんが……。
왜 율자가 우리에게 최후의 일격을 가하지 않았는지는 모르겠습니다. 단, 여전히 낙관할 수 있는 상황은 아니지만……
I don't know why the Herrscher didn't finish us off, but things still aren't looking great for us...

Anyway, you should get some more rest as you're just awake. I'll ask Emesa to check your condition again just in case.

……詳細はまた今度にしましょう。意識が戻ったばかりの身体に障ってはいけません。ゆっくり休んでください。万一に備えて、エミザにもう一度検査してもらいましょう。
……자세한 건 다음 기회로 미루지요. 의식이 돌아온 지 얼마 안 된 몸에 해로울 순 없습니다. 천천히 쉬세요. 만일을 대비해, 에미자에게 다시 한번 검사를 받도록 합시다.
...Let's get into the details later. I don't want to stress you out right after you've woken up. You should get some rest. I'll have Emesa check your condition again just in case.
Forget it...let's not talk about this, you just woke up or rest again, just in case let Emesa come back to check you again.
...... for more details. Do not disturb the body that has just regained consciousness. Get some rest. Have the emissary examine you again, just in case.

But ...... where do I go .......
155: Isn't it Oath of Judah? Don't tell me Theresa is here!
唔！这个不是犹大誓约的长矛么！难道德丽莎园长在这里么！
あっ！これ、誓約の十字架の霊刀じゃない！まさかテレサ学園長がここに！？
앗! 이거, 서약의 십자가 영검이잖아! 설마 테레사 학원장이 여기에!?
Huh? Isn't this the <tooltip entry=38>Oath of Judah</tooltip>? Does that mean principal Theresa is here!?
Well! Isn't this the spear of the Judas Iscariot? Isn't the head gardener here?
Ah! This is not the Spirit Sword of the Cross of the Pledge! Don't tell me that Teresa, the dean of the school, is here!
Scraps only. No need to be surprised.
只是废铜烂铁罢了，没什么好惊讶的。
ただのガラクタよ。別に驚くことはないわ。
그냥 잡동사니야. 별로 놀랄 일도 아니라고.
It's just a piece of scrap metal. Don't worry about it.
It's just scrap metal, nothing to be surprised about.
It's just a piece of junk. Nothing surprising.
Himeko! This shows that Theresa is still alive! We must find her!
喂！姬子！这说明德丽莎园长还活着啊！我们得去找她！
ちょっと、姫子さん！これってテレサ学園長がまだ生きてるってことでしょ！探さなきゃ！
잠깐, 히메코 씨! 이건 테레사 학원장이 아직 살아있다는 거잖아! 찾아야 해!
Hey! That must mean that Principal Theresa is still alive! We have to find her!
Hey! Himeko! This means that Head Gardener Theresa is still alive! We have to go find her!
Hey, Himeko! This must mean that Teresa, the headmistress of the school, is still alive! We have to find her!
None of my business. She has given up to fight. She's no longer our companion.
和我无关，她自己放弃了战斗，已经不是我们的战友了。
私には関係ないわ。あの人は自分から戦いを放棄したんだもの。もう戦友でもなんでもない。
나랑은 상관없어. 그 사람은 스스로 싸움을 포기했던 걸. 이젠 전우도 뭣도 아니야.
It's got nothing to do with me. She's given up on fighting. She's no longer our companion.
Nothing to do with me, she gave up the fight herself and is no longer our comrade.
It's none of my business. That man has given up the fight on his own. He is no longer a comrade-in-arms.
Don't worry, Seele. Theresa can't be killed that easily. If she was here before, then it means she still has the will to fight. Therefore we will definitely get her back.
希儿，不用太担心。以德丽莎的能力不会有危险的，既然她来过这里，就表明她还有战斗的意志，所以我们一定会把她找回来的。
テレサの能力なら危険はないでしょう。ここに来たのなら、まだ戦う意志があるということです。ですから、きっと戻ってきてくれます。
테레사님의 능력이라면 위험은 없을 겁니다. 여기까지 왔다는 건 아직 싸울 의지가 있다는 뜻이에요. 그러니 분명 돌아와 줄 거예요.
Don't worry, Seele. Theresa can't be killed that easily. If she was here before, then it means she still has the will to fight. We'll definitely get her back on our team.
Shire, don't worry too much. With Theresa's ability there will be no danger. Since she has been here, it shows that she still has the will to fight, so we will definitely get her back.
Theresa's abilities would not be in danger. If she came here, it means she is still willing to fight. Therefore, I am sure she will come back.
It's getting late, let's call it the day. We should then plan for what to do next.
好了，今天的调查就到这里吧，天色也不早了，我们回去制定一下后面的计划。
では、今日の調査はここまでにしましょう。日も暮れてきました。帰って今後の計画を立てましょう。
자, 오늘 조사는 여기까지 하죠. 날도 저물었으니 돌아가서 향후 계획을 세우도록 합시다.
Well, that's enough for today's investigation. It's getting dark out. Let's go home and plan out what to do next.
Well, that's it for today's investigation, it's getting late, let's go back and make plans for the back.
Well, that's it for today's survey. It is getting dark. Let's go home and make plans for the future.
156: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
After a few days of investigation, within a large area near the camp, the Houkai creatures are no longer active. We've not yet figured out the reason, but this grants us enough time to reassemble.
经过这几天的调查，基地周围很大范围内的崩坏生物停止了活动，虽然原因还没有查明，但是这个给了我们宝贵的时间重新调整。
調査班の報告によると、基地周辺の広い範囲で崩壊生物が姿を消しました。原因は明らかではありませんが、これは態勢を立て直す貴重な機会です。利用しない手はありません。
조사반 보고에 따르면 기지 주변 광범위 지역에서 붕괴생물이 사라졌습니다. 원인은 불분명하지만 이는 전력을 재정비할 귀중한 기회입니다. 놓칠 수 없죠.
We've been investigating the area around the base for few days and determined that the Honkai Beasts are no longer active. We still don't know the reason, but this gives us enough time to reassemble.

After the last few days of investigation, a large area around the base of the collapsed creatures ceased to be active, although the cause has not been identified, but this gives us valuable time to readjust.

The survey team reports that the decaying organisms have disappeared over a large area around the base. The cause is not clear, but this is a rare opportunity to regroup. We cannot afford not to take advantage of it.
msg
However, the investigation must go on. Himeko, lead the Graymoth Squad and extent the area of investigation to the suburb of Nagazora.
但是崩坏生物的活动必须继续调查。姬子，你带领灰蛾部队扩大搜索范围，调查长空市外围的情况。
ただし、崩壊生物の動向については調査を続ける必要があります。姫子は灰蛾部隊を率いて捜索範囲を拡大し、長空市の周囲の状況を調査してください。
다만 붕괴생물 동향에 대한 지속적 조사가 필요합니다. 히메코는 회아부대를 이끌고 수색 범위를 확대해 장공시 주변 정황을 조사해주십시오.
However, we haven't finished investigating yet. Himeko, lead the Graymoth Squad to investigate the suburbs of Nagazora.
But the activities of the Avalanche creatures must continue to be investigated. Himeko, you lead the Grey Moth unit to expand the search and investigate the situation on the outskirts of Nagumo City.
However, we must continue to investigate the trend of the collapsed organisms. Himeko should lead the ash moth unit to expand the search area and investigate the situation around Changku City.

Yes. The base has been exposed to the enemies, and even a Herrscher knows our location. It's not safe here.

Take only those useful with you. You should be ready to move out in a few days, we need to hurry.
带上最有用的东西，其他就舍弃吧。这几天大家都开始准备，我们要尽快转移。
必要な物だけを持って、あとは放棄しましょう。数日以内に動けるよう、みなさん準備しておいてください。これは早ければ早いほどいいです。
필요한 것만 챙기고 나머지는 버리기로 해요. 며칠 안에 움직일 수 있게 모두 준비해 두세요. 이건 빠르면 빠를수록 좋아요.
Take only what you need and abandon the rest. Everyone needs to be prepared to move within the next few days. The sooner we can move, the better.
Take the most useful things with you and discard the rest. Everyone start preparing in the next few days, we need to move as soon as possible.
Take only what you need and abandon the rest. Everyone should be prepared to move within a few days. The sooner you do this, the better.

说的容易…之前战斗的伤员还没有康复，转移的困难度可是很高的。
言うのは簡単だけどさ……こないだの戦いでの負傷者もまだ回復してないんだ。移動はかなり厳しいぜ。
말로는 쉽지…… 지난 전투에서의 부상자들도 아직 회복되지 않았어. 이동은 상당히 힘들 거야.
Easy to say...the wounded from previous battles have not yet recovered and the difficulty of transferring them can be very high.

Alright, cheer up! You can count on me whenever you have troubles! Don't forget I'm your jack of all trades!
好啦好啦~不要一副愁眉苦脸的样子，如果有什么困难就找我吧！别忘了我可是大家的万事屋哦！
はいはい～そんな暗い顔してないで！何か困ったことがあったらゼーレに任せて。みんなの万事屋がここにいるってこと、忘れないで！
네네~ 그런 어두운 표정 짓지 말고! 뭔가 곤란한 일이 생기면 제레에게 맡겨. 모두의 만능 해결사가 여기 있다는 것, 잊지 말아요!
Okay, okay, okay, don't look so sad, if you have any difficulties, you can find me! Don't forget that I'm everyone's everything house!
Yes, yes - don't look so gloomy! If you have any problems, leave it to Seele. Remember, everyone's all-rounder is here!
